short_summary: The Contractor must perform annual dental sterilization audits in 10 institutions in the Ontario region
description: The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to conduct annual audits of 10 institutions within the Ontario Region to assess compliance with onsite dental sterilization. The Contractor must perform audits on an annual basis and report to the Chief of Health Care and Regional Manager of Public Health any deficiencies or practices identified during the audit which are likely to harm a patient if changes are not immediately implemented. This may include recommending a temporary disruption of services to inmates until the institution takes the necessary measures to correct the deficiencies or practices and achieve compliance.
